name: Call Of Gruty - Zombies
description:
"Hello Soldier, welcome to Call Of Gruty" - Words that marked a generation, this game has been created in order to entertain, impress and captivate the viewer, and today finally, we have with us the first version 0.1 - pre alpha made Just to show the most basic mechanics, for this game especially your opinion is important, please leave a comment, it would be helping the development by leaving ideas or things that we should change. See you later and thank you very much!

  And remember: "Minions, suck my p3.nIs"

FANGAME - Super Gaming

Internet assets were used for the creation of this game
